TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Colors extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Implements a set of predefined colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color names match the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 1.0, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)] color names. This representation is based on UNIX X11 named color values. The following image shows each predefined color, its name, and its hexadecimal value. ![Predefined colors](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "Predefined colors") Color Table including a color swatch, the color name, and the hexadecimal value See the class for a variety of other more complex ways you can color an area, including gradients (, ) or images (). ## XAML Text Usage You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but you can use its static properties to assign values in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

Docs.summary: Gets the system-defined color that has an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_argb](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-argb-md.md)] value of `#FFF0F8FF`.
Docs.value: Represents colors in terms of alpha, red, green, and blue channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about color properties, see . ## XAML Attribute Usage ```
